name: markdown-feedback
description: Track-changes editor for markdown. Every edit captured as CriticMarkup.

commands.title: Markdown Feedback: Open with Track-Changes Editor

enumDescriptions: Save tracked changes inline in the .md file as CriticMarkup notation (default). File remains valid markdown; tokens are visible in other editors.
Save clean markdown to .md; store tracked changes in a .criticmark sidecar file. The .md file renders cleanly everywhere; both files must travel together.
markdownFeedback.fileMode.description: How tracked changes are stored relative to the .md file on disk.
